name: ImpactVaultManager
description: ImpactVaultManager. This contract implements a new token vault standard inspired by ERC-4626. Key difference is that ImpactVault ERC20 tokens do not entitle depositors to a portion of the yield earned on the vault. Instead, shares of yield is tracked to mint a proportional amount of governance tokens to determine how the vault's yield will be deployed. Note: this vault should always be initialized with an ERC20 token (ex: CELO) and a non-rebasing yield token (ex: stCELO).

eventDecorators.name: Claim
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when an amount of an ERC20 has been transferred from this contract to an address.

eventDecorators.name: DependenciesUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when an amount of an ERC20 has been transferred from this contract to an address.

eventDecorators.name: Initialized
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when an amount of an ERC20 has been transferred from this contract to an address.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when an amount of an ERC20 has been transferred from this contract to an address.

eventDecorators.name: Paused
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when an amount of an ERC20 has been transferred from this contract to an address.

eventDecorators.name: Receive
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when an amount of an ERC20 has been transferred from this contract to an address.

eventDecorators.name: Unpaused
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when an amount of an ERC20 has been transferred from this contract to an address.

functionDecorators.name: claimGovernanceTokens
functionDecorators.description: Claims SPRL governance tokens for a given address in proportion to the yield associated with that address across all registered vaults. Withdraws underlying yield assets from vault into this contract.

functionDecorators.name: getTotalYieldCUSD
functionDecorators.description: Returns the total yield in cUSD associated with a given address across all impact vaults.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: paused
functionDecorators.description: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
